name: Context Breaking Polyglot
description: Polyglot XSS vector designed to break out of multiple contexts.
usage_guide: Inject into any reflection. Effective against weak sanitization.

name: Universal SQLi Polyglot
description: Combines multiple SQL injection techniques into one payload.
payload: SLEEP(1) /*' or SLEEP(1) or '" or SLEEP(1) or "*/
usage_guide: Use for detection. If response delays, injection is successful.

name: Basic XSS Alert
description: Standard script tag aiming to pop an alert box.
usage_guide: Inject into reflection points. If unfiltered, an alert box will appear.

name: AWS Metadata Extraction
description: Attempts to reach the AWS link-local address for metadata.
usage_guide: Inject into URL-fetching parameters. Successful exploitation returns AWS instance data.

name: Union Based SQL Injection
description: Classic UNION SELECT injection to retrieve data from other tables.
usage_guide: Use when error-based SQLi is suppressed but data is visible. Adjust column count until it works.

name: Local File Inclusion (Linux)
description: Traverses directories to read the /etc/passwd file.
usage_guide: Inject into file-loading parameters. Look for 'root:x:0:0' in the response.

name: Python Reverse Shell
description: Standard Python reverse shell one-liner for establishing remote access.
usage_guide: Use in Command Injection scenarios. Replace ATTACKER_IP with your listener IP.

name: Bash Reverse Shell
usage_guide: Requires bash on the target. Extremely effective for Linux targets.

name: XXE OOB Exfiltration
description: XML External Entity injection designed to send data to an external server.
usage_guide: Inject into XML parsers. Requires an external DTD hosted on your server.
